nodes.documentation:
@title Database contract for a package index.
 @author Tim Coulter <tim.coulter@consensys.net>, Piper Merriam <pipermerriam@gmail.com>
nodes.name: PackageRegistry

nodes.documentation:
@dev Sets the address of the PackageDb contract.
 @param newPackageDb The address to set for the PackageDb.
nodes.name: setPackageDb

nodes.documentation:
@dev Sets the address of the ReleaseDb contract.
 @param newReleaseDb The address to set for the ReleaseDb.
nodes.name: setReleaseDb

nodes.documentation:
@dev Sets the address of the ReleaseValidator contract.
 @param newReleaseValidator The address to set for the ReleaseValidator.
nodes.name: setReleaseValidator

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (contract PackageDB,contract ReleaseDB,address,string memory,string memory,string memory) view external returns (bool)

nodes.name: release
transferPackageOwner

nodes.documentation: @dev Returns the address of the packageDb
nodes.name: getPackageDb

nodes.documentation: @dev Returns the address of the releaseDb
nodes.name: getReleaseDb

nodes.documentation: @dev Returns the address of the releaseValidator
nodes.name: getReleaseValidator

nodes.documentation:
@dev Query the existence of a package with the given name.  Returns boolean indicating whether the package exists.
 @param name Package name
nodes.name: packageExists
releaseExists
getAllPackageIds

nodes.documentation:
@dev Retrieves the name for the given name hash.
 @param nameHash The name hash to lookup the name for.
nodes.name: getPackageName

nodes.documentation:
@dev Returns the package data.
 @param name Package name
nodes.name: getPackageData

nodes.documentation:
@dev Returns the release data for the release associated with the given release hash.
 @param releaseId The release hash.
nodes.name: getReleaseData
getAllReleaseIds
isPackageOwner
